# 2026

## Super Bowl Eve Open {#super-bowl-eve-open-2026-media}

::: {#media-super-bowl-eve-open-2026}

The group celebrated after the event by raising a toast to co-founder Dan
Negrey who bowled his first career 200 game earlier in the evening! This was
also the first 200 game bowled on the tour. Congratulations Dan!

![Postgame group photo at [Char Whiskey Bar & Grille](https://char-rockyriver.com/)](images/super-bowl-eve-open-2026-postgame.jpg)

:::
